Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-44487 affecting package influxdb for versions less than 2.6.1-11
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-44487 affecting package influxdb for versions less than 2.6.1-11. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package influxdb is earlier than 2.6.1-11, affected by CVE-2023-44487
